sentences.sContent: Two crew members parachuted on to a larger floe, and then crawled on their bellies to reach him.
sentences.sContent_eng: Two crew members parachuted on to a larger floe, and then crawled on their bellies to reach him.
sentences.sCn: 两名搜救成员用降落伞落到一块更大的浮冰上，然后匍匐着去够他。

sentences.sContent: A lone Atlantic walrus rests on what looks to be an undersized ice floe amid a glassy sea in Canada's Foxe Basin.
sentences.sContent_eng: A lone Atlantic walrus rests on what looks to be an undersized ice floe amid a glassy sea in Canada's Foxe Basin.
sentences.sCn: 在加拿大福克斯湾平静的海面，一头孤独的大西洋海象在一块较小的浮冰上休息。

phrases.pCn: n. 冰川；大浮冰；小冰原
